imdb.plot outline: After waking up in a locked basement that is slowly filling with gas, ballerina/government agent Jamie and Gary must figure out how to escape the basement while completing their production of "Swan Lake" for their fans. Also, they need to save President Reagan from being shot. Also, Jamie's boyfriend is John Hinckley Jr. Everything will probably be fine.
imdb.title: Swan Lake! Live from a Locked Basement
akas: Swan Lake! Live from a Locked Basement (United States)
plot: After waking up in a locked basement that is slowly filling with gas, ballerina/government agent Jamie and Gary must figure out how to escape the basement while completing their production of "Swan Lake" for their fans.
